name: Debut Album + Signed Lyric Sheet + 3-phenia's shirt Package!
description:
Part of the Goodbye sale, (this used to be $15) now only $12 for the debut album and a 3-phenia's t-shirt! 

All sales are entered into the raffle for a grand prize that includes:
A poster
Debut Album
*Limited never printed Rise of Resister ep
*Scarf
* 3-phenia's t-shirt
Red Men's or blue Female Triangle shirt (depending on your gender!)
* 20` Sabian Ride Cymbal the first one used by our drummer at our first show together!
*Unreleased Black Apophenia Hoodie
*Unreleased Green design tee

name: Goodbye Sale - Scarfs!
description:
**High quality Apophenia Long Scarves** They are Alternative Apparel and made with a modern long cut, thin enough for fall and long enough to bundle up with in the winter. 


All sales are entered into the raffle for a grand prize that includes:
A poster
Debut Album
*Limited never printed Rise of Resister ep
*Scarf
* 3-phenia's t-shirt
Red Men's or blue Female Triangle shirt (depending on your gender!)
* 20` Sabian Ride Cymbal the first one used by our drummer at our first show together!
*Unreleased Black Apophenia Hoodie
*Unreleased Green design tee
